img_text: Raed Saleh: Convicted of Blood Libel "Homosexuality is a great crime" Claims Jews responsible for 9/11 Says women should "have a supplementary role to men" Jailed for funding Hamas Banned from UK Jeremy Corbyn: "[Raed] will be assured of a very warm welcome" "I look forward to giving you tea on the terrace because you deserve it" " represents his people very well" is a very honoured citizen"
